summary: Large Stronghold that is high up in the mountains.  Great place to store all of your weapons, armor, and other misc. items.  Also has multiple trainers, a merchant and every work room possible.  Also some specialized spells that you can only obtain here.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m currently doing a huge overhaul on this mod based on feedback.  I want to make this the ultimate player stronghold available.  The location/landscaping is HORRIBLE and that is definitely something I want to work on; but there will be much more updated.  Stay tuned....
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
V 0.2
Updated landscaping
Updated lighting
Fixed ceilings
Got rid of stairs leading up the mountain; I\'ve made it easier.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------


Dragon Mask Display
Over 100 Weapon Racks
Over 20 Mannequins
20 Dagger Display Cases (with activators)
Over 10 Bookshelves
2 Unique Spells
Trainers:
Smithing
Alchemy
Enchanting
Onehanded
Twohanded
Pickpocket
Merchant
Every Guardian Stone
Every Shrine

Exterior is WIP, but I’m sure you’ll be impressed;  I placed it very high and had to get carried away with the stairs, but the map marker you travel to should prevent you from having to climb the stairs each time you arrive.

There are some bugs and would love to hear your feedback.  I’m constantly working on this project.
author: skierymbob
